law.catch_line: Formation of sponsored captive insurer -- Conditions.

text.section: One (1) or more sponsors may form a sponsored captive insurer under KRS 304.49-010 to 304.49-230.

law.history: Amended 2010 Ky. Acts ch. 24, sec. 1617, effective July 15, 2010. -- Created 2000 Ky. Acts ch. 434, sec. 19, effective July 14, 2000.
